Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the music in the movie 'The Martian' (2015)?
Options:
A. A. Harry Gregson-Williams composed the score for The Martian.
B. B. Harry Gregson-Williams's collaboration with Ridley Scott on The Martian is their first.
C. C. Harry Gregson-Williams previously worked on the score for Kingdom of Heaven.
D. D. The Martian is the fourth collaboration between Harry Gregson-Williams and Ridley Scott.

Which songs are featured in the exit music of the movie 'The Martian' released in 2015?
Options:
A. Don't Leave Me This Way
B. I Will Survive
C. Stayin' Alive
D. My Heart Will Go On
Correct Answer: Don't Leave Me This Way, I Will Survive
